channel.title: Changing Xp Rates for Combat/Skills and cash from theiving
channel.description: how do i change the xp rates from combat, and theiving, i wanna make combat 1700xp per hit, and i wanna make theiving rates to, 500xp, 5000xp, 15000xp and 25k, 50k, 100k for cash. if someone can help me that would be great. ill make you admin on my server, just add my msn in my sig.

item.title: Changing Xp Rates for Combat/Skills and cash from theiving
item.dc:creator: @w-e_s-l_e-y w-e_s-l_e-y@hotmail.com
item.description:
@w-e_s-l_e-y wrote:

Use the search bar, there are a couple of tutorials or solved help topics wich has the result.

Read full topic
item.source: Changing Xp Rates for Combat/Skills and cash from theiving

item.title: Changing Xp Rates for Combat/Skills and cash from theiving
item.dc:creator: @Joeli Joeli
item.description:
@Joeli wrote:

Search a bit on server tutorials…

quote=“deathschaos9, post:1, topic:331347”
First up, melee and range.
Open up Client.java and start searching for

TotalExp = (double)

Hopefully you will see something like

[quote]double TotalExp = 0;
if (UseBow || UseCrossBow) {
TotalExp = (double) (A * hitDiff);
TotalExp = (double) (TotalExp * CombatExpRate);
addSkillXP((int) (TotalExp), 4);
} else if (FightType != 3) {
TotalExp = (double) (B * hitDiff);
TotalExp = (double) (TotalExp * CombatExpRate);
addSkillXP((int) (TotalExp), SkillID);
} else {
TotalExp = (double) (C * hitDiff);
TotalExp = (double) (TotalExp * CombatExpRate);
addSkillXP((int) (TotalExp), playerAttack);
addSkillXP((int) (TotalExp), playerDefence);
addSkillXP((int) (TotalExp), playerStrength);
}
TotalExp = (double) (D * hitDiff);
TotalExp = (double) (TotalExp * CombatExpRate);
addSkillXP((int) (TotalExp), playerHitpoints); [/quote]
Okay so heres the breakdown.
A - Range Exp Rate
B - Combat Exp Rate(Single Stat)
C - Shared Exp Rate(Atk, Str, Def)
D - Hitpoints Exp Rate
Of course you will have numbers where my letters are, but this is just to show you whats what.
Edit those numbers to your liking, and repeate the process again, keep searching
(…)[/quote]
This is for melee
Much helpful things http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,427703.0.html

Read full topic

item.title: Changing Xp Rates for Combat/Skills and cash from theiving
item.dc:creator: @0dragonkilla 0dragonkilla
item.description:
@0dragonkilla wrote:

hey man ill help you hit ctrl+f on client.java and search for this but at the bottom where it says addskillxp it will say like amount or sumthin and just search for this playerLevel[17] and go down to amount,17 and change amount
probably the best tutorial sorry i wish i could add a screenshot
if(playerLevel[17] >= lvlReq) {
actionInterval = 4000;
lastAction = System.currentTimeMillis();
setAnimation(emote);
sM(“You take from the stall…”);
sM(message);
addItem(item, itemAmount);
addSkillXP(5000, 17);
